verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Joel <S%H3100><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pethuel. <S%H6602><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> ye old men, <S%H2205><s%> and give ear, <S%H238><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> ye inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%> Hath this <S%H2063><s%> been <S%H1961><s%> in your days, <S%H3117><s%> or even <S%H518><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of your fathers? <S%H1><s%>

Tell <S%H5608><s%> ye your children <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> it, and let your children <S%H1121><s%> tell their children, <S%H1121><s%> and their children <S%H1121><s%> another <S%H312><s%> generation. <S%H1755><s%>

That which the palmerworm <S%H1501><s%> hath left <S%H3499><s%> hath the locust <S%H697><s%> eaten; <S%H398><s%> and that which the locust <S%H697><s%> hath left <S%H3499><s%> hath the cankerworm <S%H3218><s%> eaten; <S%H398><s%> and that which the cankerworm <S%H3218><s%> hath left <S%H3499><s%> hath the caterpillar <S%H2625><s%> eaten. <S%H398><s%>

Awake, <S%H6974><s%> ye drunkards, <S%H7910><s%> and weep; <S%H1058><s%> and howl, <S%H3213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> ye drinkers <S%H8354><s%> of wine, <S%H3196><s%> because of <S%H5921><s%> the new wine; <S%H6071><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it is cut off <S%H3772><s%> from your mouth. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6310><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> is come up <S%H5927><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> my land, <S%H776><s%> strong, <S%H6099><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> number, <S%H4557><s%> whose teeth <S%H8127><s%> are the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of a lion, <S%H738><s%> and he hath the cheek teeth <S%H4973><s%> of a great lion. <S%H3833><s%>

He hath laid <S%H7760><s%> my vine <S%H1612><s%> waste, <S%H8047><s%> and barked <S%H7111><s%> my fig tree: <S%H8384><s%> he hath made it clean bare, <S%H2834><s%> <S%H2834><s%> and cast it away; <S%H7993><s%> the branches <S%H8299><s%> thereof are made white. <S%H3835><s%>
Lament <S%H421><s%> like a virgin <S%H1330><s%> girded <S%H2296><s%> with sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the husband <S%H1167><s%> of her youth. <S%H5271><s%>

The meat offering <S%H4503><s%> and the drink offering <S%H5262><s%> is cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> ministers, <S%H8334><s%> mourn. <S%H56><s%>

The field <S%H7704><s%> is wasted, <S%H7703><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> mourneth; <S%H56><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the corn <S%H1715><s%> is wasted: <S%H7703><s%> the new wine <S%H8492><s%> is dried up, <S%H3001><s%> the oil <S%H3323><s%> languisheth. <S%H535><s%>

Be ye ashamed, <S%H954><s%> O ye husbandmen; <S%H406><s%> howl, <S%H3213><s%> O ye vinedressers, <S%H3755><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the wheat <S%H2406><s%> and for <S%H5921><s%> the barley; <S%H8184><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the harvest <S%H7105><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> is perished. <S%H6><s%>

The vine <S%H1612><s%> is dried up, <S%H3001><s%> and the fig tree <S%H8384><s%> languisheth; <S%H535><s%> the pomegranate tree, <S%H7416><s%> the palm tree <S%H8558><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> and the apple tree, <S%H8598><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> are withered: <S%H3001><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> is withered away <S%H3001><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>

Gird <S%H2296><s%> yourselves, and lament, <S%H5594><s%> ye priests: <S%H3548><s%> howl, <S%H3213><s%> ye ministers <S%H8334><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> lie all night <S%H3885><s%> in sackcloth, <S%H8242><s%> ye ministers <S%H8334><s%> of my God: <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> and the drink offering <S%H5262><s%> is withheld <S%H4513><s%> from the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of your God. <S%H430><s%>

Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> ye a fast, <S%H6685><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> a solemn assembly, <S%H6116><s%> gather <S%H622><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and cry <S%H2199><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%>

Alas <S%H162><s%> for the day! <S%H3117><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is at hand, <S%H7138><s%> and as a destruction <S%H7701><s%> from the Almighty <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7706><s%> shall it come. <S%H935><s%>

Is not <S%H3808><s%> the meat <S%H400><s%> cut off <S%H3772><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> our eyes, <S%H5869><s%> yea, joy <S%H8057><s%> and gladness <S%H1524><s%> from the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of our God? <S%H430><s%>

The seed <S%H6507><s%> is rotten <S%H5685><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> their clods, <S%H4053><s%> the garners <S%H214><s%> are laid desolate, <S%H8074><s%> the barns <S%H4460><s%> are broken down; <S%H2040><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the corn <S%H1715><s%> is withered. <S%H3001><s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> do the beasts <S%H929><s%> groan! <S%H584><s%> the herds <S%H5739><s%> of cattle <S%H1241><s%> are perplexed, <S%H943><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they have no <S%H369><s%> pasture; <S%H4829><s%> yea, <S%H1571><s%> the flocks <S%H5739><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%> are made desolate. <S%H816><s%>

O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thee will I cry: <S%H7121><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> the pastures <S%H4999><s%> of the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and the flame <S%H3852><s%> hath burned <S%H3857><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%>

The beasts <S%H929><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> cry <S%H6165><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee: for <S%H3588><s%> the rivers <S%H650><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> are dried up, <S%H3001><s%> and the fire <S%H784><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> the pastures <S%H4999><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>
